mapper.select: select tvmmSeq , tvmmName , tvmmPassword , tvmmDob , tvmmZipCode , tvmmAddress1 , tvmmAddress2 , tvmmAddressFull , tvmmEmailAccount , tvmmEmailDomain , tvmmEmailDomainCd , tvmmTelecomCd , tvmmTelNumber , tvmmAdminNy , tvmmHostNy , tvmmDesc , regDateTime from tvMember where 1 = 1 and tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmSeq = #{tvmmSeq}
mapper.update: update tvMember set tvmmDelNy = 1 where 1=1 and tvmmSeq = #{tvmmSeq}
mapper.select: select tvmmSeq , tvmmName , tvmmPassword , tvmmDob , tvmmZipCode , tvmmAddress1 , tvmmAddress2 , tvmmAddressFull , tvmmEmailAccount , tvmmEmailDomain , tvmmEmailDomainCd , tvmmTelecomCd , tvmmTelNumber , tvmmAdminNy , tvmmHostNy , tvmmDesc from tvMember where 1 = 1 and tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmSeq = #{tvmmSeq}

select a.tvamSeq , a.tvamLodgingName , a.tvamHostName , a.tvamDesc , a.tvamZipCode , a.tvamAddress1 , a.tvamAddress2 , a.tvamAddressFull , a.tvamState , a.tvamCity , a.tvamAdultPrice , a.tvamMaxPersonCount , a.tvamBedCount , a.tvamRoomCount , a.tvamShowerRoomCount , a.tvamApproveNy , a.tvamCategoryCd , a.tvamPoolNy , a.tvamJacuzziNy , a.tvamBbqGrillNy
, a.tvamGymNy , a.tvamWifiNy , a.tvamTvNy , a.tvamParkingRoomNy , a.tvamAirConditionerNy , a.tvamHeaterNy , a.tvamFridgeNy , a.tvamMicrowaveNy , a.tvamCheckInTime , a.tvamCheckOutTime , a.tvmmSeq , a.tvamTelNumber , (select tvcdName from tvCode where a.tvamCategoryCd = tvcdSeq) as 'category' , (select tvmmEmailAccount from tvMember b where a.tvmmSeq = b.tvmmSeq) as 'host' from tvLodging a where 1 = 1 and tvamDelNy = 0
and category like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and tvamLodgingName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and host like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')
limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}

select a.tvamSeq , a.tvamLodgingName , a.tvamHostName , a.tvamDesc , a.tvamZipCode , a.tvamAddress1 , a.tvamAddress2 , a.tvamAddressFull , a.tvamState , a.tvamCity , a.tvamAdultPrice , a.tvamMaxPersonCount , a.tvamBedCount , a.tvamRoomCount , a.tvamShowerRoomCount , a.tvamApproveNy , a.tvamCategoryCd , a.tvamSeaNy , a.tvamPoolNy , a.tvamJacuzziNy , a.tvamBbqGrillNy , a.tvamFirePlaceNy , a.tvamGymNy , a.tvamWifiNy , a.tvamTvNy , a.tvamParkingRoomNy , a.tvamAirConditionerNy , a.tvamHeaterNy , a.tvamFridgeNy , a.tvamMicrowaveNy , a.tvamSmokeNy , a.tvamCookingNy , a.tvamPetNy , a.tvamPartyNy , a.tvamCheckInTime , a.tvamCheckOutTime , a.tvmmSeq , a.tvamTelNumber , a.regDateTime , c.type , c.defaultNy , c.sort , c.originalName , c.uuidName , c.ext , c.size , c.delNy , c.year , c.month , c.day , (select tvcdName from tvCode where a.tvamCategoryCd = tvcdSeq) as 'category' , (select tvmmEmailAccount from tvMember b where a.tvmmSeq = b.tvmmSeq) as 'host' from tvLodging a left join tvLodgingUploaded c on a.tvamSeq = c.tvamSeq and c.defaultNy = 1 where 1 = 1 and tvamDelNy = 0 and a.tvamSeq = #{tvamSeq} and c.defaultNy = 1
mapper.update: update tvLodging set tvamDelNy = 1 where 1=1 and tvamSeq = #{tvamSeq}
mapper.select: select a.tvcpSeq , a.tvcpName , a.tvcpNumber , a.tvcpPrice , a.tvcpStartDate , a.tvcpEndDate , a.tvcpDesc , a.tvamSeq , a.regDateTime , b.tvamLodgingName , c.tvmmEmailAccount from tvCoupon a left join tvLodging b on a.tvamSeq = b.tvamSeq left join tvMember c on b.tvmmSeq = c.tvmmSeq where 1 = 1 and tvcpDelNy = 0 and tvcpSeq = #{tvcpSeq}
mapper.update: update tvCoupon set tvcpDelNy = 1 where 1=1 and tvcpSeq = #{tvcpSeq}
mapper.select: select a.tvpmSeq , a.tvpmAdNumber , a.tvpmStartDate , a.tvpmEndDate , a.tvpmPrice , a.tvcpSeq , b.tvcpPrice , a.tvpmtotalPrice , a.tvpmPayTypeCd , a.tvpmDesc , a.tvamSeq , a.regDateTime , c.tvamLodgingName , c.tvamTelNumber , (select tvmmEmailAccount from tvMember e where e.tvmmSeq = c.tvmmSeq) as 'hostEmail' , a.tvmmSeq , d.tvmmName , d.tvmmTelNumber , d.tvmmEmailAccount from tvPayment a left join tvCoupon b on a.tvcpSeq = b.tvcpSeq left join tvLodging c on a.tvamSeq = c.tvamSeq left join tvMember d on a.tvmmSeq = d.tvmmSeq where 1 = 1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and tvpmSeq = #{tvpmSeq}
mapper.update: update tvPayment set tvpmDelNy = 1 where 1=1 and tvpmSeq = #{tvpmSeq}
mapper.select: select tvcdSeq , tvcdName , tvcgSeq from tvCode where 1=1 and tvcdDelNy = 0

select count(*) from tvLodging where 1 = 1 and tvamDelNy = 0
and category like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and tvamLodgingName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and host like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')

select count(*) from tvCoupon a left join tvLodging b on a.tvamSeq = b.tvamSeq left join tvMember c on b.tvmmSeq = c.tvmmSeq where 1 = 1 and tvcpDelNy = 0
and b.tvamLodgingName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and a.tvcpName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and host like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')

select count(*) from tvPayment a left join tvCoupon b on a.tvcpSeq = b.tvcpSeq left join tvLodging c on a.tvamSeq = c.tvamSeq left join tvMember d on a.tvmmSeq = d.tvmmSeq where 1 = 1 and tvpmDelNy = 0
and c.tvamLodgingName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and d.tvmmEmailAccount like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and d.tvmmName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')

select count(*) from tvMember where 1 = 1 and tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 1
and tvmmName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and tvmmEmailAccount like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')

select count(*) from tvMember where 1 = 1 and tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0
and tvmmName like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') and tvmmEmailAccount like concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')
select tvmmSeq ,tvmmName ,tvmmEmailAccount ,tvmmAdminNy from tvMember where tvmmEmailAccount = #{tvmmEmailAccount} and tvmmPassword = #{tvmmPassword}

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = month(now()) group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 1 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 2 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 3 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 4 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 5 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 6 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 7 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 8 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 9 group by month

select month(regDateTime) as 'month' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice) as 'sales' , sum(tvpmtotalPrice)*0.1 as 'fees' , count(tvpmSeq) as 'reservationCount' , (select count(*) from tvMember where tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmAdminNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 0) as memberCount from tvPayment where 1=1 and tvpmDelNy = 0 and month(regDateTime) = 10 group by month
select type , defaultNy , sort , originalName , uuidName , ext , size , delNy , year , month , day , tvmmSeq from tvMemberUploaded where 1=1 and tvmmSeq = #{tvmmSeq}
